author: Anonymous Helix
title: natural of number
question:
At what time, we need to use natural in the signature?
Is 0 a natural number?
student_answer:
You need to use Natural in the signature if the function takes natural. 
Zero is natural to my understanding as it comes under counting the items (0 to infinite)
check @441 for better understanding.
Just to add: 0 is a Natural number to Dr Racket, but not in mathematics (so confusion is understandable).
